resources.string: Sometimes you get a hankerin\' for \"Sheenisms\".

Because you have absolute and total resolve about your decisions. If you love with violence and you hate with violence, there\'s nothing that can be questioned. Major League 3? I don\'t know. I haven\'t read it. I don\'t care. And therefore there\'s nothing in the middle. I don\'t live in the middle anymore. That\'s where you get slaughtered. That\'s where you get embarrassed in front of the prom queen. And it\'s just not an option. And you know, I\'m tired. I\'m so tired of pretending like my life isn\'t perfect and bitchin\' and just winning every second. And I\'m not perfect and bitchin\', and just delivering the goods at every frickin\' turn. Debate me on AA right now. I have a disease? Bullshit. I cured it with my brain; with my mind. I\'m gonna hang out with these two smokin\' hotties and fly privately around the world. You know, it might be lonely up here, but I sure like the view, Alex. Debate me on AA right now. I have a disease? Bullshit. I cured it with my brain; with my mind.
Boom, crush. Night, losers. Winning, duh.
